#########
# Texts for sap.ca.message and sap.ca.dialog
##########

#XBUT: Button for confirm the message
dialog.ok=OK

#XBUT: cancel button
dialog.cancel=Cancel

#XTIT: Title of the Message Box in case of an error
messagetype.error=Error

#XTIT: Title of the Message Box in case of a waring
messagetype.warning=Warning

#XTIT: Title of the Alert Message Box in case of an info
messagetype.info=Information

#XTIT: Title of the Alert Message Box in case of a success
messagetype.success=Success

#XLNK: Link for open the details of the message
messagebox.showdetails=Show Details


#########
# Texts used in Forward Dialog
##########

#XTIT: Title of Dialog
forward.title=Forward

#XMSG: Error message if no recipients are found (for forward)
forward.noRecipients=No recipients found

#XBUT: Confirmation Button of Dialog
forward.button=Forward

#YMSG: DIALOG_QUESTION: "Forward to Jaap van Vorden?"
forward.question=Forward to {0}?


#########
# Texts for FileSize Type
##########

# YMSG: File Size Unit one Byte
FileSize.Byte=Byte

# YMSG: File Size Unit
FileSize.Bytes=Bytes

# YMSG: File Size Unit Kilobyte (short)
FileSize.Kilobytes=KB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Megabyte (short)
FileSize.Megabytes=MB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Gigabyte (short)
FileSize.Gigabytes=GB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Terabyte (short)
FileSize.Terabytes=TB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Petabyte (short)
FileSize.Petabytes=PB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Exabyte (short)
FileSize.Exabytes=EB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Zettabyte (short)
FileSize.Zettabytes=ZB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Yottabyte (short)
FileSize.Yottabytes=YB

# YMSG: File Size Unit Error too big number > 1e23
FileSize.Error=File is too large

#########
# Texts for FormatterLibrary
##########

#XFLD: This text is used for combination of description and id (e.g. "iPhone (0001)", where {0} = iPhone and {1} = 0001)
FormattingLibrary.DescriptionAndId={0} ({1})

#########
# Texts for Notes Control
##########

#XMSG: Toast message when pasted text over limit
TextOverlimit=Maximum note length of {0} characters has been reached

#XMSG: Placeholder in the "add note" textarea
notes.addNotePlaceHolder=Add note

#########
# Texts used in Expansible FeedListItem
##########

#XFLD: Label for "See more" link, used to show hidden lines of text when the comment is too long.
extensiblefeedlistitem.seeMore=More

#XFLD: Label for "See more" link, used to show hidden lines of text when the comment is too long.
extensiblefeedlistitem.seeLess=Less

#########
# Texts used in Date Picker
##########

#XTIT: Title of the DatePicker
datepicker.title=Select Date

#########
# Texts used in CaFormatter
##########

#XFLD: This text is used for combination of description and id (e.g. "iPhone (0001)", where {0} = iPhone and {1} = 0001)
Formatting.DescriptionAndId={0} ({1})

#YMSG: default text in the text area
YMSG_TEXT_NOTE=Add note (optional)

#YMSG: default text in the text area
YMSG_TEXT_NOTE_MANDATORY=Add note (required)

#########
# Texts used in HierarchicalSelectDialog
##########

#YMSG: default text in the text area
hsd.searchTextField=Search

#########
# Texts used in Add Picture Control
##########
#########
# Texts for DateFormatter
##########

# YMSG: Time when sth. (e.g. a leave) was created today
DateFormatter.Today=Today

# YMSG: Time when sth. (e.g. a leave) was created yesterday
DateFormatter.Yesterday=Yesterday

# YMSG: Time when sth. (e.g. a leave) was created x days ago (Plural; e.g. 2 days ago)
DateFormatter.DaysAgo={0} days ago


#XBUT: Button to confirm the dialog
hsd.okButton=OK

#XBUT: Button for cancel the dialog
hsd.cancelButton=Cancel
#XBUT: Label for the Add Picture Control Button
addPicture.text=Add Picture

#########
# Texts used in OverviewTile
##########

#XFLD: Label for adress
OverviewTile.address=Address

#XFLD: Label for opportunities
OverviewTile.opportunities=Opportunities

#XFLD: Label for revenue to date
OverviewTile.revenue=Revenue to Date

#XFLD: Label for rating
OverviewTile.rating=Rating

#XFLD: Label for last contact
OverviewTile.lastAppointment=Last Appointment

#XFLD: Label for next contact
OverviewTile.nextAppointment=Next Appointment
#########
# Texts used in FileUploader
##########

#XTIT: Label for the file save control
FileUploader.save=Save

#XTIT: Label for the file cancel control
FileUploader.cancel=Cancel

#XTIT: Label for the file upload control
FileUploader.upload=Upload File

#XFLD: Label for the uploading progress
FileUploader.uploading=Uploading\: {0}% complete

#XFLD: Label for the uploading progress
FileUploader.uploadingOutOf=Uploading {0} of {1}

#XFLD: Label for the date label
FileUploader.attached={0} by {1}

#XFLD: Label for the date label
FileUploader.attached_phone={0} by {1}

#XTIT: Label of delete file confirmation dialog
FileUploader.deleteFile=Delete File

#XBUT: Button for confirming the deletion of a file
FileUploader.continue=Continue

#XFLD: Label for the question in the confirmation dialog of deleting a file
FileUploader.deleteQuestion=Are you sure you want to delete this item?

#XFLD: Label for the number of attachments displayed
FileUploader.attachments=Attachments

#YMSG: Error Message when a file fails to upload
FileUploader.error.fileUploadFail=Cannot upload file

#YMSG: Error Message when the server fails to return base64 encoded string
FileUploader.error.base64Error=Cannot retrieve base64 encoded string

#YMSG: Error Message when File Upload retrieves invalid response
FileUploader.error.invalidResponse=Cannot upload file

#YMSG: Error Message when a file is too large to upload
FileUploader.error.fileSizeError=File is too large

#YMSG: Error Message displayed when a connection is lost
FileUploader.error.connectionLost=Connection has been lost

#XFLD: Placeholder text for the file name input box.
FileUploader.inputPlaceholder=Enter Name

#########
# Texts used in Quickoverview - Employee and Company
##########

#XTIT: popup title for quickoverview
Quickoverview.popovertitle=Quick Overview

#XTIT: Title of Form
Quickoverview.employee.contacttitle=Contact Details

#XTIT: Title of Form
Quickoverview.employee.companytitle=Company

#XFLD: Label for mobile phone
Quickoverview.employee.mobile=Mobile

#XFLD: Label for work phone
Quickoverview.employee.phone=Phone

#XFLD: Label for email
Quickoverview.employee.email=Email

#XFLD: Label for name
Quickoverview.employee.name=Name

#XFLD: Label for address
Quickoverview.employee.address=Address

#XTIT: Title of Form
Quickoverview.company.contacttitle=Contact Details

#XTIT: Title of Form
Quickoverview.company.maincontacttitle=Main Contact

#XFLD: Label for contact phone
Quickoverview.company.phone=Phone

#XFLD: Label for company address
Quickoverview.company.address=Address

#XFLD: Label for main contact's name
Quickoverview.company.maincontactname=Name

#XFLD: Label for main contact's mobile
Quickoverview.company.maincontactmobile=Mobile

#XFLD: Label for main contact's phone
Quickoverview.company.maincontactphone=Phone

#XFLD: Label for main contact's email
Quickoverview.company.maincontactemail=Email

##########
# Texts Used by the Default Chart Popover in the Line Chart
##########

#XBUT: Button for default popover close
LineChartPopover.close=Close

#XBUT: Button for default popover details
LineChartPopover.details=View Details

##########
# Texts Used incorrectly by the Chart Popover in the others Charts
# Should be using checrt speciific texts
##########

#XBUT: Button for default popover close
ChartPopover.close=Close

#XBUT: Button for default popover details
ChartPopover.details=View Details

#XTIT: Title for default popover details
ChartPopover.title=Current Selection

#########
# Texts for sap.ca.ui.CustomerContext
##########

#XTIT: Title of screen used for selecting a customer amongst several
CustomerContext.TitleSelect=Select Customer

#XTIT: Title of screen used for changing the selected customer amongst several
CustomerContext.TitleChange=Change Customer

#XBUT: ok (select a customer) button
CustomerContext.Ok=OK

#XBUT: cancel button
CustomerContext.Cancel=Cancel

#XFLD: Placeholder for the customer search field (search in a list of customemrs)
CustomerContext.Search=Search

#XFLD: header of the column displaying the customer sales area
CustomerContext.SalesArea=Sales Area

#XFLD: Text displayed when there are no customers in to be selected
CustomerContext.NoData=No results found

##########
# Texts Used in the ChartToolBar
##########

#XFLD: Label for the table chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Table=Table

#XFLD: Label for the Bar Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Bar=Bar Chart

#XFLD: Label for the StackedBar Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.StackedBar=Stacked Bar Chart

#XFLD: Label for the StackedBar100 Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.StackedBar100=Stacked Bar Chart

#XFLD: Label for the DualStackedBar Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.DualStackedBar=Stacked Bar Chart

#XFLD: Label for the DualStackedBar100 Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.DualStackedBar100=Stacked Bar Chart

#XFLD: Label for the Column Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Column=Column Chart

#XFLD: Label for the StackedColumn Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.StackedColumn=Stacked Column Chart

#XFLD: Label for the StackedColumn100 Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.StackedColumn100=Stacked Column Chart

#XFLD: Label for the DualStackedColumn Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.DualStackedColumn=Stacked Column Chart

#XFLD: Label for the =DualStackedColumn100 Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.DualStackedColumn100=Stacked Column Chart

#XFLD: Label for the Line Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Line=Line Chart

#XFLD: Label for the Combination Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Combination=Combined Chart

#XFLD: Label for the Bubble Chart
ChartToolBar.ChartName.Bubble=Bubble Chart

Add Title to start a new FormContainer(Group). Add Label to start a new row in the container. Add Input/Display controls as needed. Use LayoutData to influence the layout for special cases in the Input/Display controls. * @extends sap.ui.core.Control * * @author * @version 1.18.0 * * @constructor * @public * @since 1.16.0 * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm */ sap.ui.core.Control.extend("sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm", { metadata : { // ---- object ---- // ---- control specific ---- library : "sap.ui.layout", properties : { "maxContainerCols" : {type : "int", group : "Appearance", defaultValue : 2}, "minWidth" : {type : "int", group : "Appearance", defaultValue : -1}, "editable" : {type : "boolean", group : "Misc", defaultValue : null}, "labelMinWidth" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 192}, "layout" : {type : "sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleFormLayout", group : "Misc", defaultValue : sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleFormLayout.ResponsiveLayout}, "labelSpanL" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 4}, "labelSpanM" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 2}, "labelSpanS" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 12}, "emptySpanL" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 0}, "emptySpanM" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 0}, "emptySpanS" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 0}, "columnsL" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 2}, "columnsM" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 1}, "breakpointL" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 1024}, "breakpointM" : {type : "int", group : "Misc", defaultValue : 600} }, defaultAggregation : "content", aggregations : { "content" : {type : "sap.ui.core.Element", multiple : true, singularName : "content"}, "form" : {type : "sap.ui.layout.form.Form", multiple : false, visibility : "hidden"}, "title" : {type : "sap.ui.core.Title", altTypes : ["string"], multiple : false} } }}); If not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata. * @return {function} the created class / constructor function * @public * @static * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm.extend * @function */ /** * Getter for property maxContainerCols. * The maximum amount of inner FormContainers per row that is used before a new row is started. * (If a ResponsiveGridLayout is used as layout this property is not used. If the available width is below the given minWidth the SimpleForm will create a new row for the next FormContainer. * -1 value is default meaning that inner FormContainers will be stacked until maxCols is reached, irrespective if a maxWidth is reached or the available parents width is reached. * (only used if ResponsiveLayout is used as Layout) * * Default value is -1 * * @return {int} the value of property minWidth * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#getMinWidth * @function */ /** * Setter for property minWidth. * * Default value is -1 * * @param {int} iMinWidth new value for property minWidth * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#setMinWidth * @function */ /** * Getter for property editable. * Applies a device and theme specific line-height to the form elements if the form has editable content. * In this case all (not only the editable) rows of the form will get the line height. * * Default value is empty/undefined * * @return {boolean} the value of property editable * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#getEditable * @function */ /** * Setter for property editable. * * Default value is empty/undefined * * @param {boolean} bEditable new value for property editable * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#setEditable * @function */ /** * Getter for property labelMinWidth. * Specifies the min-width in pixels of the label in all form containers. (only used if ResponsiveLaout is used as Layout) * * Default value is 192 * * @return {int} the value of property labelMinWidth * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#getLabelMinWidth * @function */ /** * Setter for property labelMinWidth. * * Default value is 192 * * @param {int} iLabelMinWidth new value for property labelMinWidth * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#setLabelMinWidth * @function */ /** * Getter for property layout. * The FormLayout that is used to render the SimpleForm * * Default value is ResponsiveLayout * * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleFormLayout} the value of property layout * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#getLayout * @function */ /** * Setter for property layout. * * Default value is ResponsiveLayout * * @param {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleFormLayout} oLayout new value for property layout * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#setLayout * @function */ /** * Getter for property labelSpanL. * Default span for labels in large size. * This span is only used if more than 1 container is in one line, if only 1 container is in the line the labelSpanM value is used. * (This property is only used if a ResponsiveGridLayout is used as Layout.) * * Default value is 4 * * @return {int} the value of property labelSpanL * @public * @since 1.16.3 * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#getLabelSpanL * @function */ /** * Setter for property labelSpanL. * * Default value is 4 * * @param {int} iLabelSpanL new value for property labelSpanL * @return {sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm} this to allow method chaining * @public * @since 1.16.3 * @name sap.ui.layout.form.SimpleForm#setLabelSpanL * @function */ /** * Getter for property labelSpanM. * Default span for labels in medium size. * This property is used for full size containers. If this value is set to false, the min-width will be set to 0 and the wrapping is up to the previous element. * * Default value is true * * @return {boolean} the value of property linebreakable * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData#getLinebreakable * @function */ /** * Setter for property linebreakable. * * Default value is true * * @param {boolean} bLinebreakable new value for property linebreakable * @return {sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData#setLinebreakable * @function */ // Start of sap/ui/layout/ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.js /*! * @copyright@ */ sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.MIN_WIDTH = 100; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.WEIGHT = 1; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.LINEBREAK = false; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.MARGIN = true; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.LINEBREAKABLE = true; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.prototype.setWeight = function(iWeight) { if (iWeight >= 1) { this.setProperty("weight", iWeight); } else { jQuery.sap.log.warning("Values smaller than 1 are not valid. Default value '1' is used instead", this); this.setProperty("weight", sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.WEIGHT); } return this; }; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.prototype.setLinebreak = function(bLinebreak) { // if the element should not be linebreakable and a forced linebreak should // be set if (this.getLinebreakable() == false && bLinebreak) { jQuery.sap.log.warning("Setting 'linebreak' AND 'linebreakable' doesn't make any sense! Please set either 'linebreak' or 'linebreakable'", this); } else { this.setProperty("linebreak", bLinebreak); } }; sap.ui.layout.ResponsiveFlowLayoutData.prototype.setLinebreakable = function(bLinebreakable) { // if the element has a forced linebreak and the element should be set to // not linebreakable if (this.getLinebreak() === true && bLinebreakable === false) { jQuery.sap.log.warning("Setting 'linebreak' AND 'linebreakable' doesn't make any sense! Please set either 'linebreak' or 'linebreakable'", this); } else { this.setProperty("linebreakable", bLinebreakable); // this.setMinWidth(0); } };

content.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><!--

    Copyright (C) 2009-2013 SAP AG or an SAP affiliate company. All rights reserved

--><core:View xmlns:core="sap.ui.core" xmlns="sap.m" controllerName="ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.view.S2"><!--Scaffolding S2 applied-->
	<Page id="page" title="{i18n>view.Master.title}">
		<content>
			<List id="list" mode="{device>/listMode}" select="_handleSelect">
				<ObjectListItem id="MAIN_LIST_ITEM" number="{parts:[{path : 'Value'}], formatter : 'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.lazyRoundNumber'}" numberUnit="{Currency}" press="_handleItemPress" title="{SupplierName}" type="{device>/listItemType}">
					<firstStatus>
					    <ObjectStatus id="STATUS1" text="{parts:[{path:'WiCreatedAt'}], formatter:'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.formatDaysAgo'}"/>					                  
					</firstStatus>
					<attributes>
						<ObjectAttribute id="ATTR1" text="{ItemDescriptions}"/>
						<ObjectAttribute id="ATTR2" text="{CreatedByName}"/>
						<ObjectAttribute id="ATTR3" text="{parts:[{path : 'ForwardedByName'}], formatter : 'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.forwardedBy'}" visible="{parts:[{path : 'ForwardedByName'}], formatter : 'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.commonFieldVisibilityTrigger'}"/>
						<ObjectAttribute id="ATTR4" text="{parts:[{path : 'SubstitutingForName'}], formatter : 'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.substitutedBy'}" visible="{parts:[{path : 'SubstitutingForName'}], formatter : 'ui.s2p.mm.purcontract.approve.util.Conversions.commonFieldVisibilityTrigger'}"/>
					</attributes>
					<core:ExtensionPoint name="extListItemInfo"/>
				</ObjectListItem>
			</List>
		</content>
		<footer>
			<Bar id="footer"/>
		</footer>
	</Page>
</core:View>

      . * When called, the context of the event handler (its this) will be bound to oListener if specified * otherwise to this sap.m.ObjectAttribute.
      itself. * * Event is fired when the text is active and the user taps or clicks on it * * @param {object} * [oData] An application specific payload object, that will be passed to the event handler along with the event object when firing the event. * @param {function} * fnFunction The function to call, when the event occurs. * @param {object} * [oListener=this] Context object to call the event handler with. Defaults to this sap.m.ObjectAttribute.
      itself. * * @return {sap.m.ObjectAttribute} this to allow method chaining * @public * @name sap.m.ObjectAttribute#attachPress * @function */ /** * Detach event handler fnFunction from the 'press' event of this sap.m.ObjectAttribute.
